artifact.name: The Golden Idol
artifact.description: A priceless ancient artifact made of solid gold, depicting a deity from an unknown civilization.

suspects.name: Vincent Vandal
suspects.description: Known art thief with a history of stealing valuable artifacts from museums.
suspects.motive: To sell the artifact on the black market for a large sum of money.

suspects.name: Gina Greed
suspects.description: Rich socialite with an obsession for rare and valuable items.
suspects.motive: To add the artifact to her private collection as a status symbol.

suspects.name: Eddie Enigma
suspects.description: Master of disguise and espionage, known for pulling off elaborate heists.
suspects.motive: To use the artifact as leverage in a high-stakes negotiation.
